lender.name: Ken M.
lender.loan_because: I believe that many of the world's problems can be solved by simple solutions.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Strategic Partner at Spry Digital LLC. We create sustainable solutions for small business and nonprofits that allow them to grow. Please join our Kiva team: http://www.kiva.org/team/sprydigital

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: life isn't easy.
lender.occupational_info: I'm pursuing my PhD in marine conservation biology (focusing on fisheries management)

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to feel I've made a difference.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are trying to better their lives an opportunity to do so.

lender.name: Dav
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help others around the world. God blesses me so that I may bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a U.S. domestic airline. I am on the airplane for the safety and security of the passengers.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: Money should not deter anyone from living out their ideas.

lender.name: Michael & Brett
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to have good jobs.
lender.occupational_info: Desire to give a bit of help to others so they can achieve their dream.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I can so easily help someone with amounts that are small to me but large to them - it's a great way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people live happier, healthier lives

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and a good use of funds. . . teaching people to fish rather than simply giving a fish.

lender.name: Karuna
lender.loan_because: To remember and honor my niece.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It changes my consciousness

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good!
lender.occupational_info: I search for bombs using a trained dog.

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: I cannot imagine going a day without enough to eat, clean water, and a safe roof over my head. My loans may be small, but my heart is worth millions.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the banking industry to pay the bills, but I am a soap maker at heart. I love crafting my own bath and body products. There's nothing better for your skin than soap made with rich oils and emollient butters.

lender.name: Kaitlin
lender.occupational_info: I am a student now studying to be a librarian. I hope to make information and education available and free for as many people as possible. Right now my job is preserving rare manuscripts and making them viewable on the internet for the public.

lender.name: Natasha
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy to know that i'm doing a good thing
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 12 year-old student I want to be a 12 year-old student

lender.name: Mary Riechers
lender.loan_because: I understand that the loans people need to sustain themselves and their families can only come from an organization such as KIVA. May everyone be happy and free from suffering

lender.name: Tim Becky Katie Amy
lender.loan_because: Jesus said, "Freely you have received, so freely give" Matthew 10:8
lender.occupational_info: We are a family. Dad works in finance. Mom runs the home. Kids go to school.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I believe that hand out's don't always work. Help those who want to learn how to fish to fish.

lender.name: Brenda Hart
lender.loan_because: I received a Kiva gift certificate as a present and think this is a great idea. I believe in loans as a helping hand instead of a handout. I practice this in my own business that is jewelry manufacturing in Peru
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and also design painted jewelry which is made in Peru. We work with about 20 painters and assemblers at present and we are a member of The Fair Trade Federation

lender.name: George and Nancy
lender.occupation: Bed and Breakfast operator and George is a writer.
lender.loan_because: We believe that if everybody does a little bit to help others it all adds up to a lot! We think the Kiva concept is brilliant.
lender.occupational_info: As a retired journalist, George now operates a bed and breakfast, is an author, and does freelance writing and photography. Nancy works for a law firm and specializes in real estate matters. George also has published two books about the now-closed Collingwood Shipyards. He used Blurb.com and information about the books, The Collingwood Shipyards, and A Salute to Sidelaunchings, can be found on that company's website. George has one about those books too and it is at www.collingwoodshipyardsbooks.vpweb.ca.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are struggling and cannot receive standard loans because they are considered a risk because they are not established or have money. The way our loaning system works sucks and I am happy to see a site like this ensures the American Dream!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of specialists. Love my job!

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: a big part of faith means investing in other people, in this world, not just pining for the hereafter.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Lutheran Christian pastor.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and it feels good man!
lender.occupational_info: I let people be safe in a dangerous environment so they can live well.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because:
i see the connection, i am not removed from my neighbor's pain, however far they may be from me.
And of course my little sis

lender.name: Denise & Joe
lender.loan_because: We have built our own successful businesses and want to offer a hand up to others who can use it.
lender.occupational_info: Denise is a former lawyer and now an author and workshop leader. Joe is the founder of a successful recruiter.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: What a great way to do something nice

lender.name: Allen and Linda
lender.loan_because: We found Kiva as a result of a Christmas charity exchange. A great way to help people around the world help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Engineering and Administration

lender.name: Reda yamani
lender.loan_because: Giving back is the right thing to do. The more you give the more you get! :)
lender.occupational_info: I promote businesses online to make more sales. Internet is the new way for financial independence and an opportunity to be a good citizen of the world.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.whereabouts: North Curl Curl New South Wales

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: its a caring thing to do as we are so fortunate in our country
lender.occupational_info: i am a ordinary kind of worker from a trade background ,

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a wonderful life and I would like to share the wealth a little and help someone else out.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: everybody should have a chance
lender.occupational_info: I build electrical devices for money, and artistic creations in my spare time.

lender.name: Kaitlin
lender.loan_because: Loans open doors.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student and intern at a community health center. Right now I assist a professor with teaching at a local university.

lender.name: Tapan
lender.loan_because: I care and Kiva makes it easy.

lender.name: Stian
lender.loan_because: I hope to give a small contribution to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting people to reach their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an actor, director, producer and in various other roles within the performing arts sector.

lender.name: Lehani
lender.loan_because: Nothing is truly mine in the first place
lender.occupational_info: I love working with young children and currently teach 5 and 6 year olds in a remote Aboriginal community

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people willing to help themselves by putting in an effort

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: I want to help decrease world suck, and I dont want to waste my graduation money.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school to study languages and ways to keep our earth healthy so our kids and grandkids can live here for a long long time, and still see all the animals and plants that we have today.

lender.name: Tylor
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at University California, Santa Cruz

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I design and print tee shirts and other apparel

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: ...because free markets are ultimately the one assured path to prosperity and happiness for everyone around the world.

lender.name: Tuomo
lender.loan_because: It seems to be a very good way to promote women to start their career as entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: Environmental engineering

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe in charity in all forms, not only financial. I am blessed and the very least I can do is give from what I have been blessed with.

lender.name: SURABHI
lender.loan_because: to establish my proffession

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Sometimes just the smallest 'hand up' makes the biggest difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in international education, and have worked in Egypt, Vietnam and Sudan.

lender.name: Manni
lender.loan_because: because I can, that simple

lender.name: Angelito
lender.loan_because: I need more finances to upgrade my computer
lender.occupational_info: My work is difficult because if don't update your knowledge about computer technology you won't cope up with the latest technology.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: People who work hard deserve a chance and I am blessed to be able to give someone that chance.

lender.name: Marie
lender.occupational_info: I provide medical care and advice to women during pregnancy and throughout their lives.

lender.name: James Benamor
lender.loan_because: Kiva is one of the best ideas to come out of lending or not-for-profit organisations for years.
lender.occupational_info: I own and run an innovative lender in the UK that makes loans to individuals who are refused credit by banks. Similar to microfinance lenders we lend based on people's social bonds, not on computerised credit scores.

lender.name: Lukas
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: Love is reciprocal.
lender.occupational_info: Fun with teaching...interpreting history.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I had help starting my career and would like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph all kinds of people and events. I do portraits, weddings, family photos, and food photography.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I have faith in a better world, and I believe the only way this will come about is through deliberate action to change things.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in the field of Cognitive Psychology, so I study the mind: how it learns, processes, understands, and constructs meaning in the world.

lender.name: Lukas
lender.occupational_info: Economics Student

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing the gifts that I have with the rest of the world. I support Kiva's mission to make the world a smaller place by connecting hardworking people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach music lessons to children and adults of all ages; I enjoy teaching and playing the flute and piano.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I know I was a winner in the genetic and geographic lottery. It was largely just luck of the draw...

lender.name: Paul & Carol
lender.loan_because: I can. And because it's easy. And because KIVA giving concept is incredible. Individually, so little to lose and globally, so much to be gained.
lender.occupational_info: Paul: Working on LAX construction project Carol: grandma things and a bit of resale

lender.name: Ross S.
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their way in the world. People that have better circumstances can help lift us all.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: The earth is the Lord's

lender.name: Calle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives. And i also want to help people who are willing to work for profit and be responsible with their earnings.

lender.name: Terry and Carol
lender.loan_because: For both humanitarian and religious reasons. My wife and I are glad to help people have the dignity of helping themselves! Go for it! Tend to lend to women more than men because women are more commonly oppressed in the world.
lender.occupational_info: semi-retired and tend to lend half of our loans to older people too.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Jesus loves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teenagers about world history, how to grow in their relationship with God, and who Jesus was and is.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell property and businesses in California.

lender.name: Avatar Teas, USA
lender.loan_because: Education to children will change the world. If small business owners can invest a portion of their earning to educating their children, that will be my dream..
lender.occupational_info: I work in the IT industry. But my soul is in creating a large Tea Business and employ a number of workers.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have the ability to do so!
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student at the University of North Carolina at Greensboro, in North Carolina, USA. I am studying to become a counselor, someone who works with people to help them create a life worth living!

lender.name: Moiz
lender.loan_because: I want to help inspired entrepreneurs succeed at their business.

lender.name: Doris and Tony
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel privileged and thus we have a duty to help others less privileged.

lender.name: max
lender.loan_because: it's freakin' awesome

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I think its a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I help business become more environmentally friendly. I am also taking a design course to help me do this better.

lender.name: Mt Vernon Team
lender.loan_because: This loan is made in the names of Walter , Brian P, JC , Maurya, Brian M, Karl, Shawn,Richard, Mary, Don and Sheila.
lender.occupational_info: Distribution

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Telecom infrastructure and services design and implementation, and providing training.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I am hoping my good fortune can benefit others wanting to make a change in their life
lender.occupational_info: I run a order processing department for a large technology company

lender.name: Jo
lender.loan_because: We must all help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 9 and 10 year old children.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to offer hope and support to those deserving individuals who are doing their best to seize opportunities and succeed by way of hard work & entrepreneurship.

lender.name: John Michael
lender.loan_because: To give those with very little opportunity a chance at improving their lives. I have been blessed with opportunity in my life and wish the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct health and safety inspections to protect people from accidents and injury.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: It's a great sustainable way to empower women in developing countries.

lender.name: Dene
lender.loan_because: My job gives me an opportunity to study the benefits of microloans on development.
lender.occupational_info: I study human rights and conflict.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: After reading the book Half The Sky by Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn, I realized how much of an impact I could easily make to those in need around the world, especially to entrepreneurs who are women.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies make better decisions about how they operate and take care of their workers.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to fulfill their dreams, make a living and care for their families with a little help from others.

lender.name: Ian and Lauren
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Jacob Jay
lender.loan_because: I believe in promoting social responsibility, and supporting entrepreneurialism through independent sustainable small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I developed and run an ecommerce / online shop hosting service.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Leen
lender.loan_because: Il y a l, les murmures, un soupir, l'aventure...

lender.name: harika
lender.loan_because: i want to help people who need money for a good things

lender.name: Der Stefan
lender.loan_because: Having something to give should be reason enough to share. And lending money to make people help themselves is one great way to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I dont think my work matters here.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I design all things electrical.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: We wanted to give gift certificates to ten grandchildren so they could experience helping others.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupation: Volunteer at a special school, helping people

lender.name: cary
lender.loan_because: My money helps others more then it helps me.

lender.name: Fleur
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to make a big impact with a small amount of money - and I am impressed by the thought that has gone into this from the Kiva founders, staff and supporters.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small research team in a university. We study how to build good family and community environments for children. We work with lots of community partners to put what we find in our research into practice.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Hebrews 13:1

lender.name: Sameer
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who need support to start or grow their business..Help them get on their feet and reach their full potential.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: Microfinance empowers loan recipients...and it's kind of fun to play banker.
lender.occupational_info: I work in government to help put technology into the hands of learners, making education more engaging, and opening up access to tremendous amounts of information.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: After 300 years of large scale capitalism, the world would benefit greatly from some small scale socialism.
lender.occupational_info:
I count and I write and I think. Then I put my digits, my text and my thoughts into a database. And when my work is done - the database can repeat my work for ever and ever.
It is like my contribution to Kiva: I loan money to someone, when this person repays the loan I can loan that money to someone else, again and again, for ever and ever.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I recently started a small business of my own so I appreciate the support others give me. I also have a long-term interest in development issues, having volunteered in Africa years ago.
lender.occupational_info: I help injured and disabled people find new careers.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: i believe in helping others
lender.occupational_info: partner at Thrust Interactive; an independent game studio and third-party developer of mobile and online games

lender.name: Vikas
lender.occupational_info: Create Communication Solutions for Small Businesses Globally

lender.name: Kyro
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva gives us a chance to make real progress on a person-to-person level with the least politics and outside meddling involved.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a financial institution, also teach yoga/chi gung and manage agricultural rental property.

lender.name: Amy Kay
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the world and help others who are striving to help themselves. What a beautiful way to help spread Abundance!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: change a life. change the world.
lender.occupational_info: i run a small doctor's office. my job is to make sure everything runs smoothly all the time.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: what I take for granted in the UK is so much more than others will ever have.
lender.occupational_info: Building Cost Specialist

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I would like to teach my children to appreciate what they have and learn to share with other people who will gain so much from our support

lender.name: GiftsforCharity
lender.loan_because: Helping those that are less fortunate than us makes the world a better place.

lender.name: Jim & Ginny
lender.loan_because: This is a golden opportunity to help those lacking traditional access to resources that otherwise would be out of reach.
lender.occupational_info: Inspiring those who are looking for a hand up - not necessarily a hand out.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: Making a small effort in any way, is far better than making no effort at all!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I help power plants control and report harmful air emissions.

lender.name: Maria & Adam
lender.loan_because: Shouldn't everyone?

lender.name: Viktor
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student studying the Earth and other planets. I study, I teach, and I volunteer at a local museum.

lender.name: ROBIN
lender.loan_because: I want to help women to succeed around the world

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: People want a hand up, not a handout.

lender.name: Sumaiya
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves. Instead of giving them a fish...giving them a fishing pole :-).
lender.occupational_info: I make pastries and baked goods with natural and organic ingredients. I am a senior in college majoring in Health & Wellness with a concentration in social issues. I am also a certified massage therapist.

lender.name: Dean Thoreau
lender.occupation: trying to be a better human
lender.loan_because: I believe all people have the right as citizens of this world to have a decent place to sleep, the right to decent nourishment, and the right to be themselves.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: When I was a child my family relied on the generosity of others to help us on numerous occasions. I understand that sometimes all people need is a leg up and it can change there lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic artist. I create printed artwork, websites, and video.

lender.name: Mena
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who need a loan, and gradually build up funds to replace something someone might have lost or needs. I hope it helps those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am at High school, but do not work as I am currently to young but this gives me extra time to do things like support people through Kiva.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world become a better place for all people.

lender.name: Jeremy & Jackie
lender.loan_because: A small amount of our money can do a large amount of good in other countries.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to see equity in the world. I think everyone should have the ability to pursue their dreams.
